analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Ekadhammo, bhikkhave, bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati—
analyzed: eka dhammaḥ bhikkhave bhāvitaḥ bahulīkataḥ ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati
diṭṭhadhammikam ca iva attham samparāyikam ca

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhave, ekadhammo bhāvito bahulīkato ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati—
analyzed: ayam kho bhikkhave eka dhammaḥ bhāvitaḥ bahulīkataḥ ubho atthe samadhigayha tiṭṭhati
diṭṭhadhammikam ca iva attham samparāyikam ca ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
